title: A Conversation With The Head Of Morgan Stanley’s Global Sustainable Finance Group: Creating A Playbook For Financial Institutions To Advance The Circular Economy And Alleviate Plastic Pollution - Forbes
content: A Conversation With The Head Of Morgan Stanley’s Global Sustainable Finance Group: Creating A Playbook For Financial Institutions To Advance The Circular Economy And Alleviate Plastic Pollution  Forbes
description: I spoke with Morgan Stanley about the plastic waste crisis, what global financial institutions can do to scale the sector and what kinds of investments they're seeing that excite them.
